Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.28741926]Gram-positive bacteria :Staphylococcuss aureus ATCC 25923 (MIC=16 μM);Gram-negative bacteria :Escherichia coli ATCC 25922 (MIC=1 μM)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.28741926] 42-49.8% hemolysis at 64 μM against human red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.28741926] CC50 = 31.6 ± 1.3 μM against CRL-1739, CC50 = 5.4 ± 0.3 μM against MM96L, CC50 = 31.3 ± 2.6 μM against HFF-1, CC50 = 41.0 ± 4.2 μM against HeLa, CC50 = 15.1 ± 1.4 μM against MCF-7, CC50 = 3.9 ± 0.1 μM against K-562.
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria and Gram-negative bacteria

Literature.Title: Redesigned Spider Peptide with Improved Antimicrobial and Anticancer Properties
Literature.Author: Sonia Troeira Henriques, Nicole Lawrence, Stephanie Chaousis, Anjaneya S. Ravipati, Olivier Cheneval,Aurelie H. Benfield, Alysha G. Elliott, Angela Maria Kavanagh, Matthew A. Cooper, Lai Yue Chan,Yen-Hua Huang, and David J. Craik
